job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI at ABN AMRO in the role of an engineering who can maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes used within the team to improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

Your job

   Thousands of customers interact with ABN AMRO on a weekly basis. We want to make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner.

   Here at Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.

   In the Cognition team we are responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions to ensure they meet evolving customer needs and industry standards.

   Subjects you might be working on include: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows, implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts, implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms, design how we store and manually annotate data etc.

   Most recently we are in a middle of a massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot while attempting to empower our solutions with LLMs in a manner that is responsible, secure and reliable within the standards of ABN AMRO.

Working environment

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.

   In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.
job_details.full_text:
Backend Engineer

We are looking for an enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI at ABN AMRO in the role of an engineering who can maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes used within the team to improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

Your job

   Thousands of customers interact with ABN AMRO on a weekly basis. We want to make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner.

   Here at Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.

   In the Cognition team we are responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions to ensure they meet evolving customer needs and industry standards.

   Subjects you might be working on include: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows, implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts, implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms, design how we store and manually annotate data etc.

   Most recently we are in a middle of a massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot while attempting to empower our solutions with LLMs in a manner that is responsible, secure and reliable within the standards of ABN AMRO.

Working environment

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.

   In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Conversational AI, LLMs, Chatbots, Voicebots, and LLM-based Advisor Assist. It mentions implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts and classification algorithms, and a significant migration to MS Copilot while empowering solutions with LLMs. These align directly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts' directly relates to the core process of adapting and evaluating generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms' indicates work on model training and evaluation, a key aspect of the modeling task.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows' points to the design and building of data infrastructure and pipelines.
job_tasks.phrase: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'backend developers' in the working environment and the overall context of maintaining and improving conversational AI workflows implies building and integrating AI features into systems.
The phrase 'automating the data and ml processes' and 'maintaining and improving our Conversational AI workflows' suggests involvement in operationalizing and managing AI processes.
job_tasks.phrase: automating the data and ml processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'maintaining and innovating on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling' implies the operational aspect of keeping these systems running and improving them.
job_tasks.phrase: maintaining and innovating on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'empower our solutions with LLMs' directly relates to the application and fine-tuning of large language models.
The phrase 'design how we store and manually annotate data' relates to the software development aspects of data management for AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: design how we store and manually annotate data

soft_skills.phrase: working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers
